title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, , Polish, Russian.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  You are the deadliest sniper in the elite Ghost Warrior unit. Positioned deep within enemy territory, deliver precision firepower and test your skills in an epic story of intrigue and betrayal. Feel the kill as you control your breathing and experience a realistic ballistics system. Epic single player campain and multiplayer sniper battles. Powered by cutting-edge CryENGINE® 3 technology.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: AW 50
childDownloads.description: The AW-50 is capable of taking out light radar installations, light vechicles (including LAMs), field fortifications and munitions dumps… not to mention enemy forces. Nothing can say “Boom Headshot” like this rifle.

childDownloads.title: Collectors Pack
childDownloads.description: The DLC  PACK includes the following items:  • two premium sniper rifles – the Vintorez and DSR rifles to use in multiplayer battles • four exclusive playable characters to use in multiplayer battles: Diaz, Maddox, Marinov and the Marine Team Leader

childDownloads.title: Jungle Soldier
childDownloads.description: The true soldier of fortune, dishonorably discharged ex-army Spec Ops, hand-picked and deadly

childDownloads.title: Kalao Character
childDownloads.description: Filipino national, shot caller fo Abu Sayyaf, high up on Al Qaeda’s Xmass list. Power hungry maniac itching to make a name for himself

childDownloads.title: Limited Edition
childDownloads.description: The DLC  PACK includes the following items: • Excluisive multiplayer character – Anderson, the main character of Sniper Ghost Warrior 2 available to use in multiplayer modes • The Vintorez – a suppressed, accurate and deadly limited edition weapon available to use in multiplayer modes

childDownloads.title: MK14 EBR & skins
childDownloads.description: The M14 EBR is a highly ergonomic, high precision, designated-marksman rifle that may tip the balance of battle in your favor on any battlefield. It’s accuracy, as well as the capacity to successfully use it under CQB circumstances, makes it one of your best friends in a hairy situation. Together with two unique skins that will help you blend in, this is one of the rifles you can’t miss out on.

childDownloads.title: Multiplayer Expansion Pack
childDownloads.description: The multiplayer DLC includes two new maps, Tower Defense and Temple Crossing, providing the perfect terrain for some intense sniping action. The DLC will also include a Deathmatch mode where players will play  up to 8 people, in a bid to prove that they are the ultimate snipers.

childDownloads.title: Siberian Strike
childDownloads.description: US Central Intelligence discovers a top secret Russian military research facility that is assembling weapons of mass destruction, manufactured and destined for potential US enemy states. CIA undercover operative. Diaz is sent into the facility in the remote Siberian city of Birsovik and begins sending reports to his CIA commanders. Suddenly Diaz goes dark and reports stop flowing. Worried about their operative, the CIA initiates a black ops mission to Birsovik

childDownloads.title: Wheeler
childDownloads.description: Special Operations Commander put in charge of the Joint Military Force “Task 121”. He earned his codename, “Lazarus”, during the US invasion of Panama when he threw himself on top of a live grenade. Scarred, ruthless and ready to do anything to achieve victory.

childDownloads.title: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 Sarajevo Urban Combat trailer
childDownloads.description: There are soldiers and then there are snipers. As a Sniper you control the battlefield. You see everything and you decide the fate of your enemies. You work in the shadow, and your every shot counts. You’re a ghost. A Ghost Warrior. Your mission is to shoot once… and kill. Death from afar is what you deal out. But sometimes  a sniper bullet is meant to be heard. The new and intense trailer of Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 takes you to the heart of war-torn Sarajevo and makes you feel what does it mean to be a real sniper

childDownloads.title: M14 Sniper Rifle
childDownloads.description: M14 Designated Marksman Rifle, issued by the US Marine Coprs – stern, reliable and lightweight – will never fail you and provide all the tactical advantage you’ll ever need on the battlefield.

childDownloads.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
childDownloads.description: The „World Hunter Pack” is the third downloadable content pack for Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2. This multiplayer-centric expansion contains four all new maps for both Team Deathmatch and Squad Deathmatch modes. “Jungle Camping” and „Industrial District” (Squad DM) plus „CQC Hotel” and “Forest Pursuit” (Team DM) offer unique gameplay experiences, from smaller action heavy arenas to large open zones for the most meticulous players.

childDownloads.title: Marine
childDownloads.description: The Marine – the backbone of many military operations is now available to use in multiplayer modes

childDownloads.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2 - Gold
childDownloads.description: Experience the full spectrum of sniper warfare with this premium DLC pack for Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
